data.title: EBTEL: Enthalpy-Based Thermal Evolution of Loops
data.name: EBTEL
data.description: Enthalpy-Based Thermal Evolution of Loops (EBTEL) model coded in the IDL language by J. A. Klimchuk, S. Patsourakos, and P.J. Cargill

evidence: "Enthalpy-Based Thermal Evolution of Loops (EBTEL) model coded in the IDL language by J. A. Klimchuk, S. Patsourakos, and P.J. Cargill."

"Purpose

Compute the evolution of spatially-averaged (along the field) loop quantities using simplified equations.  The instantaneous differential emission measure of the transition region is also computed."

Usage examples show direct execution as an IDL program: e.g., "IDL> ebtel2, time, heat, length, t, n, p, v, ..." with no mention of package managers or binary releases, implying distribution via the source repository.
